metadata.name: HH.EXE Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of "hh.exe" to open ".chm" files.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('hh.exe') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\hh.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.chm')))

output.summary: Detects the execution of "hh.exe" to open ".chm" files.

metadata.objective: False positive: False positives are expected with legitimate ".CHM" References: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1218.001/T1218.001.md, https://eqllib.readthedocs.io/en/latest/analytics/b25aa548-7937-11e9-8f5c-d46d6d62a49e.html, https://www.zscaler.com/blogs/security-research/unintentional-leak-glimpse-attack-vectors-apt37
